Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ERRO 2fb Failed to generate platform-specific docker build: could not decode url: ChaincodeSpec's path/URL cannot be empty 2017-02-06 14:53:05.245 UTC dockercontroller deployImage -> ERRO 2fc Error building images: Failed to generate platform-specific docker build: could not decode url: ChaincodeSpec's path/URL canno t be empty 2017-02-06 14:53:05.245 UTC dockercontroller deployImage -> ERRO 2fd Image Output: ******************** ******************** *fabric-sdk-node Commit#* https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-node/commit/a8ff8cdec52cb4ca80db3488599347bbf77b033f >

Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: This one is needed to cut the Alpha release. I talked to Binh, and we want the Alpha to work with the gettingstarted in the docs, so please let us know what we would need to change externally (i.e. no more dockerfile, etc). Thanks, bmos299
